select a.brand_id as brandId,a.`name` as brandName,a.category_name as categoryName,a.pic,b.id,b.is_onshelf as isOnshelf,b.passed from t_brand a,t_store_brand b
(a.name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or a.category_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or b.is_onshelf like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or b.passed like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and a.brand_id=b.brand_id and b.store_id=#{storeId}
order by id
select brand_id,name,category_name,pic from t_brand where brand_apply="PASS"

select * from t_brand
( name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or keywords like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and brand_apply="PASS"
order by
${orderColumn} ${orderType},
sort asc

select a.brand_id as brandId,a.name as brandName,a.category_name as categoryName,a.pic,a.store_id,b.name as storeName,b.grade_id as gradeId,b.member_id as memberId from t_brand a, t_store b
( a.name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or a.category_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or b.name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and a.store_id=b.store_id and a.brand_apply="APPLYING"
order by
${orderColumn} ${orderType}

select c.id,a.brand_id as brandId,a.name as brandName,a.category_name as categoryName,a.pic,a.store_id,b.name as storeName,b.grade_id as gradeId,b.member_id as memberId from t_brand a, t_store b,t_store_brand c
( a.name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or a.category_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or b.name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and c.store_id=b.store_id and c.brand_id=a.brand_id and c.passed="审核中"
order by
${orderColumn} ${orderType}
